fields.subject: UCN Request
fields.body: Dealer ID {0} has requested for a UCN. Details as follows: Customer ID: {2}  Service type: {1}  Actual kms: {3}  Reason: {4}  Job card url: {5}

fields.subject: Thank you for feedback
fields.body:
We have received your {type}.
 Our team will get back to you soon.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id} Details
fields.body:
Your {type} has been assigned to one of our technician.
 Severity:{priority}.The due date is:{due_date}.
 Once it resolved we will notify you.

fields.subject: Feedback with reference-no-{id} Assign To You
fields.body:
A GladMinds user has a {type} for us, which says:
 {message}. 
 Its has been reported by {reporter} on {created_date}.
 It has been assigned to you and due date is: {due_date}
 Please address the issue as soon as possible.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id}
fields.body:
A GladMinds user has a {type} for us, which says:
 {message}.
 It has been reported by {reporter} on {created_date}.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id} resolved
Feedback  with reference-no-{id} resolved
fields.body:
The {type} reported by {reporter} on {created_date} has been resolved.
 The root cause was {{root_cause}}
